sentences.en: Diagnosis and Treatment of Giant Greater Occipital Cistern ( Report of 30 Cases )
sentences.cn: 巨型枕大池的诊断与治疗 ( 附30例报告 )

sentences.en: Drink water from your own cistern, running water from your own well.
sentences.cn: 你要喝自己池中的水, 饮自己井里的活水.

sentences.en: Fixed cistern barometers are used as a standard for checking altimeter.
sentences.cn: 固定槽式气压计可以作为标准件去检验测高计.

sentences.en: Fixed cistern barometers are used as a standard for checking aneroid barometers.
sentences.cn: 固定槽式气压计可以作为标准件去检验无液气压计.

sentences.en: Fixed cistern barometers are used as a standard for checking.
sentences.cn: 固定槽式气压计可以作为标准件去检验.
那是一个古代的蓄水池。

sentences.en: One day she put rocks in her pocket and stepped into a cistern where she drowned.
sentences.cn: 有一天，她在自己口袋中塞满了石头，转身跳入了一个水池，溺水而亡。

sentences.en: The cistern empties in five minutes.
The cistern is empty but soon fills again.
sentences.cn: 蓄水池里现在没水,但不久就会储满水的.

sentences.en: The cistern is empty but will soon fill again.
sentences.cn: 水缸空了,但很快又会满的.
贮水糟里的水溢出来了.

sentences.en: The large particles ease to down in the cistern.
sentences.cn: 大粒径颗粒在液池中易于沉降,对其具有较好的洗涤分离效果.
厕所水箱的水溢出来了.

sentences.en: The water slowly emptied ( from the cistern ).
sentences.cn: 水 ( 从贮水池 ) 缓缓流出.

sentences.en: Wall toilet with low - level cistern. Drag to the edge of a wall.
sentences.cn: 带有低水位水箱的抽水马桶. 拖动到墙的边缘.

sentences.en: We'll go over to that cistern and case it by moonlight.
sentences.cn: 咱们到水池去一趟,趁着月光作一番探索.

trans.tran_cn: 蓄水池，储水箱，地下储水池
